dcterms:description: In this dataset, four colored balls bounce around in a frame. Balls bounce off the walls and each other upon interaction. Each ball is one of five colors and each color has an associated ordinal number. The dataset includes several subsets (Mod1, Mod2, Mod3, Mod1234) that progressively increase in difficulty, requiring longer-term and more complex dependencies to accurately predict future frames.
dcterms:title: Bouncing Balls

dcterms:creator: R. Girdhar
D. Ramanan
dcterms:description: CATER is a 3D dataset that consists of videos of objects moving around in a scene. The flagship task for this dataset is a snitch localization task, which requires predicting the location of the golden snitch at the end of the video. This task necessitates understanding the effect of different actions in the environment and reasoning about them.
dcterms:title: CATER
